title: About
text:
About me
I am currently in my sixth year of studying Civil Industrial Engineering at Universidad de los Andes. I have a deep passion for data analytics, technology, and finance. I thrive on learning about new technologies and enjoy applying my skills to tackle real-world challenges.


Laboral Experience


Intern ar Euroamerica S.A, Santiago, Chile
December 2023 — January 2024

Worked at the money desk within the investment department.
Updated valuation models for the corporate bond portfolio.
Developed an automated reporting system.
Gained insights into the financial industry’s workings and developed technical skills in data analysis and programming.
Applied data science knowledge to real-world financial problems.


Intern at Millenium S.A, Santiago, Chile
December 2021 — February 2022

Performed administrative tasks and evaluation of new production equipment.



Teaching Assistant for Stochastic Models at Universidad de Los Andes, Santiago, Chile
July 2022 — December 2022

Assisted in the Stochastic Models course.



Instructor for Introduction to Programming at Universidad de Los Andes, Santiago, Chile
March 2022 — June 2022

Guided new students in the Introduction to Programming course.
